channel.title: What is the IP address of Redash service to add to whitelist?
channel.description: Hi there. I've tried 52.71.84.157/32 to set as the source of incoming traffic to my AWS RDS instance, but without any luck. What is the correct IP address of Redash service?

item.title: What is the IP address of Redash service to add to whitelist?
item.dc:creator: freeminder
item.description:
Looks like I found it in Top hosts of AWS RDS instance’s usage.
It was 65.21.2.162/32.

Read full topic
item.source: What is the IP address of Redash service to add to whitelist?
